description: Enumerates autoruns from HKLM/HKCU Run & RunOnce (incl. WOW6432Node), extracts executable paths, and records signer status (signed/valid, Microsoft-trusted). Outputs NDJSON (summary + one line per entry) and writes atomically to the Active Response log with .new fallback.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
